mapper.select: select fc.* from feed f, feed_comment fc where f.feed_id = fc.feed_id and fc.feed_id = #{feedId} and fc.is_delete = false
mapper.insert: insert into feed_comment(user_id,feed_id,comment,is_delete,created_at,modified_at) values (#{user_id}, #{feed_id}, #{comment}, false, now(), now())
mapper.update: update feed_comment set comment = #{comment}, modified_at = now() where feed_id = #{feed_id} and comment_id = #{comment_id}
mapper.delete: delete from feed_comment where feed_id = #{feed_id} and comment_id = #{comment_id}
mapper.update: update feed_comment set is_delete = true where feed_id = #{feed_id} and comment_id = #{comment_id}
